member.name: ID3D12VersionedRootSignatureDeserializer.GetRootSignatureDescAtVersion
member.summary: Converts root signature description structures to a requested version.
member.param: Contains the deserialized root signature in a structure.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code. The method can fail with E_OUTOFMEMORY.

member.name: ID3D12VersionedRootSignatureDeserializer.GetUnconvertedRootSignatureDesc
member.summary: Gets the layout of the root signature, without converting between root signature versions.
member.returns: This method returns a deserialized root signature in a structure that describes the layout of the root signature.

member.name: ID3D12VersionedRootSignatureDeserializer
member.summary: Contains methods to return the deserializeddata structure, of any version of a serialized root signature.
